root.name: Call of Duty Online
root.description: Call of Duty Online is a free-to-play shooter set to be released in mainland China. It will be based in the Modern Warfare universe and will tell a unique story.The multiplayer will be fueled by microtransactions. Players will be able to purchase and "personalize" equipment, including weapons and perks. The game features weapons, maps and modes from Modern Warfare and Modern Warfare 2.
